name: ordinary-starfish-54
author: simontheonlyone
description: ordinary-starfish-54 组件 (animation, orange, button, heart, unique, text animation, focus, creative, minimal, interactive)

uniapp.template:
<button class="container"></button>
  <text class="effect orange_effect"></text>
  <text class="effect white_effect"></text>
  <view class="heart heart_left"></view>
  <view class="heart heart_right"></view>
  <view class="like">I love it</view>
</button>
